name: Type One Ventures
description:
Inspired by astrophysicist Nikolai Kardashev’s method for measuring a civilization's level of technological advancement (the Kardashev scale), Type One Ventures has the goal of advancing humanity closer to a technologically advanced Type One Civilization. 

We are a venture capital fund investing in Seed and Series A startups with operational expertise, capital, and industry resources. The startups we invest in have dynamic teams and are building technical products with the capability to progress humanity forward. At Type One, we help founders harness their superpowers so they can change the world.
slogan: Investing capital, operational expertise & resources in startups that are progressing humanity forward.
